name: Chris Stewart
text: Pretty good pizza, but pretty much in the same ballpark with Top That and Blaze and several others I have been to.  There are several options on crust.  Focused mostly on a make it right there for an individual.  Atmosphere was good.  Staff was friendly.  Have a nice outdoor area.  Overall, would stop by again.

name: bigj theSinger
text: Well kept secret in Tulsa hills! Cooked fresh and  Lots of options like gluten free and cauliflower crust pizza.  Made fresh and for a decent price especially on Mondays when you can get any size pizza for 555! We got the traditional high five with spicy marinara and half olive/jalepenos (see picture) delicious!!!

name: Robert Butler
text: The food, ingredients and cooking method are fine. Staff use gloves (which for me is not optional, I do NOT eat at establishments whose employees do not use gloves to prepare food) which makes for a clean meal at least. My main gripe is …More

name: Heather Work
text: Delicious pizza & great assortment of toppings. Avoid rush times though. Went on a Sunday after a rush and they were running out of certain crusts. Family of 6 ate for about $50. Thin crust was good & tasted like saltine crackers!

name: Alex Diebold
text: Exceptional pizza for the cost, they have regular menu items or you can customize your own. The spicy pizza sauce isn't too hot, it the regular sauce with some Sriracha mixed it, it's no hotter than a Tabasco sauce but still has depth of …More

name: Amber
text: There is NO point on trying to save time by ordering online. Their response at 6:47pm when my online order was supposed to be ready at 6:45pm was "oh we have an online order" I waited an additional 15 minutes standing at the register since …More

name: Allison K
text: I love this restaurant. Their new cauliflower crust is AMAZING, too! I've never had a bad experience or cold pizza for that matter. …More

name: Adam Dwyer
text: Their cauliflower crust pizza was literally the best pizza I have ever eaten and I’ve tried many different types of pizzas. I am looking forward to being able to go back soon. ^_^

name: Wally Nunn
text: Clean, friendly staff & great pizza!! I had the cauliflower crust and I was blown away by how delicious it was. It was crisp and had no residual taste of cauliflower. I will be back...soon!

name: Trina Ingram-Jones
text: Quick pizza.  Crispy crust and the 5 star with magic dust!!  You can build your own pizza and they have vegan and non gluten options.

name: Dianna Surratt
text: As long as you aren’t expecting any particular speed of service, the pizza is fine. This is our second visit and the second time we’ve waited over 30 minutes in line with only 4 individuals in front of us. I recommend steering clear if you …More

name: steven clingerman
text: I was in town for work and I love pizza. I think I will make this a stop Everytime in in town. The BBQ chicken pizza was amazing. And it was very quick.

name: Sammie Lucas
text: Great pizza, fast service.  Lots of goodies on the pie.  Have an appetite when you order.  A personal size can feed two if you're not real hungry.  Try this place if you're a pizza lover or in a hurry.

name: Chris Chynoweth
text: Fantastic service in a fantastic and clean environment. Fantastic made to order pizzas exactly the way you want them. I couldn't ask for a better pizza place!

name: Mallory R
text: I wish there was an option for 0 stars. Our experience here was so bad, it was almost comical. And the food was just... horrible (greasy, undercooked, gross - like many of the other reviews state). We had eaten at the location in Moore …More

name: Crystal Simmons
text: First time visitor and will definitely be back. It took us a second to rap our heads around, but truely love the concept. My husband's pizza bubbled up rally bad, he only had cheese he wanted to taste the crust and the sauce. They were quick to remake it and he loved it as much as Ioved mine with all the fixings! Highly recommend!

name: Bethany Stubblefield
text: Pretty average, staff were friendly when they first opened but now it’s like someone sucked all the happiness out of them? Cheer up buddy. My personal favorite is the gluten free crust with vegan cheese and spinach on marinara.

name: Thomas Foote
text: I like this place. It's a soft crust which I normally don't like, but it works well for this pizza. Topping selection is good, the toppings look fresh to me. My daughter loves the big pepperoni they use.

name: Dustin Ridling
text: Do you like lukewarm pizza from poorly managed restaurants?  Well buddy, you've come to the right place!  Pizza tastes fine, just not hot at all.  This location has a Coca-Cola Freestyle drink machine that offers dozens of drinks with a …More

name: Luke James
text: Comfortable place to grab lunch. Pizza was a good size. If you like creating your own concoction, you’ll find the freedom here.

name: trista Nixon
text: The vegan cheese option is amazing! They even keep it covered so that the dairy cheese doesn't cross contaminate it. I already tried to find a location closer to my house.

name: Wes Douglas
text: Loved this place, well done!! Blaze pizza better watch out! One suggestion, find better salad bowls for carry out or at least a real bowl for dining in.

name: Trish Buchan
text: Pie Five makes one of the best salads you will ever find in Tulsa for a very reasonable price! Try one, you won't be disappointed, but you will be full!

name: marc wood
text: Good selection of toppings. Choice of 4 crust. Friendly service.

name: David Lucas
text: Very good pizza for the price and you build it to your liking, and as much toppings as to you like.

name: Megan Taylor
text: Cauliflower crust pizza! It's great to be able to have a keto option for pizza.

name: Jamie Pruitt
text: Pizza was excellent but we had to clean our own table.

name: Hennessy
text: Loved it! The pizza was delicious and the cheese was stringy. The cinnamon sticks were amazing as well. Definitely coming back here soon!

name: Gwen McKnight
text: Great food, clean, and prompt and courteous service

name: Katina Augustine
text: We came here for lunch because they offer a GF pizza.  When we went in there was one guy checking out and no one behind up or in the lobby so no distractions.  I asked if they offered GF in a large and the guy said yes and asked what kind …More

name: Hannah Parker
text: LOVE this place! Food and service was amazing

name: Mo *isms
text: They put way too much cheese and the thin crust we ordered was doughy and not cooked all the way. Had to bring it home to cook. Not happy campers.

name: lonny thornley
text: Good good , it's like subway but for pizza

name: Terri Vajda
text: Geat options, super friendly staff, and wonderful prices!  Pick your own toppings or go with one of their standards.  Always a treat!

name: Mike Myers
text: Great pizza, fresh ingredients and always fast service. Will be back a lot since I work down the road now.

name: Thomas Kempsey
text: I have been to Blaze, Pieology,   pizzaRev, 900 degrees and MOD pizza. All fast casual build as you go pizza places. This was my first time to a Pie Five and it was around noon on a weekday and they were empty while other restaurants next …More

name: Kat Everett
text: The pizza is made fast and the toppings are plentiful.  But the pizza isnt cooked long enough in the pven so the toppings dont get completly hot. Price and quickness are great. The pizza is just OK.

name: Shelley Chandler
text: Very tasty - especially the cauliflower crust.  Fast service and friendly employees.

name: Martin Mullican
text: Great pizza!  Lot's of choices and really fast, too.

name: Denise Ashley
text: My husband and I became adult  consumers in the age of the Pizza Jojnt craze in the 70s. Every other Corner housed a Pizza parlor and friends would discuss like trophies, their pizza consumption escapades. Pie 5 pizza was delucious.provided …More

name: Robert Earl Jackson
text: Excellent service and great pizza.

name: Kaleigh Haber
text: I saw this cauliflower pizza on Facebook, and I have to tell you...I was super hesitant. I've never had Pie5 before, so a lot wad hinging on this. I am SUPER IMPRESSED!! IT WAS SO GOOOOOD! The consistency was nothing like I …More

name: crossdresser 88
text: Good pizza set up similar to the old top That pizza had a good time and enjoy the atmosphere was good

name: HONDA HERETIC
text: Great customer service and amazing pizza that you get to create and try!

name: Donna dry
text: Amazing!!!! This is the best pizza! A must try! Great customer service as well.

name: Craig Peters
text: Amazing! Best Puzza I've had in a long time ... probably because I built it.

name: Laura Long
text: Certain cheeses weren't out of the freezer for the standard pizzas. Teas were not prepared for the lunch crowd, nor provided after request during lunch. Shakers on 4 of the 5 tables checked were empty of peppers and parmesan. Wouldn't recommend.

name: William Taylor
text: Awsome food they have pizza and its set up like sub shops you have your 9inch for 6.99 or 14 inch for i think 11.99 not sure about price on that 14 inch and you add your topings to it for no additional amount

name: Jennifer Ellcey
text: I tried the pizza and I had never been there and I did the build your own and I got the traditional sauce and wasn't very impressed. I didn't like it at all. Idk if I would go back as the pizza wasn't hot either. So not very impressed. 😂😂😂.Maybe they should let you taste the sauce because it didn't taste very good.

name: Scott Patrick
text: I love Mondays and going to pie 5 pizza for their special

name: jim danforth
text: Not heated through. Ingredients pretty bland.  Chicken carbonara with no garlic?  Size is good, and deep dish had nice quantity of cheese.  Bummer it was again cold when j sat down.

name: Leslie Bennett
text: Yummy! Loved it! Awesome 🍕! The spicy marinara sauce is so yummy, get it on your Margarita Pizza to make it delicious.

name: Derek S
text:
Perfect size pizza, as many toppings as possible, good price. Incredible dessert.
Would recommend.

name: Catelyn Wilbourn
text: It was ok pizza. They were out of bread sticks and chicken and Alfredo sauce when I went. Hopefully it was a fluke day and they keep it stocked more.

name: Ms Shannon -If you're Nasty-
text: Ran out of some dough, so I couldn't get what I originally wanted, but the food was good and the service was great.

name: rico thompson
text: Nice place could be a little cleaner. Beer tap is constantly broke, pizza is pretty good.

name: David Fudge
text: Yeah, this place, although a chain, really is well done and does have a local feel...and the food...the food is great!

name: Kevin Jackson
text: Literally the best piece of anything I've ever put in my 👄.

name: Blondie Sanders
text: The food was good, service was good.

name: Angelique Grobman
text:
My husband got a pizza from here and was up all night vomiting.
It was late evening when we got it so perhaps the toppings had been out all day and had gone bad. The place was also dirty so could also be poor cleanliness …More

name: Dylan Hart
text: Better than Top That, much better than Blaze.  Great environment, lots of options, amazing crust, awesome flavor, and a Coke Freestyle machine.

name: Lola Plute
text: Love going here and watch as my pizza is made.

name: Brian Poirier
text: Great, and friendly  staff.  Delicious pizza

name: Lendon Brown
text: Very good, very good price, pretty fast

name: Mase Driskell
text: St first I gave them 4 stars then about 6 hours later me and my gf started getting very sick. They are all we had eaten that day so we know it was cause d by them.  We think maybe they left one of the toppings out overnight or something but whatever they did we will never be going back here.

name: Steve Poteet
text: First time going to pie five loved it

name: KDN
text: Delicious when you can create your own pizza, fast, friendly service 2!

name: Theresa Roman
text: Tastes like when I was growing up. Real authentic pizza, not synthetic tasting.

name: Stephanie L. Jackson
text: Great quality and price

name: Debby
text: I had a salad, but it was delicious!

name: James Taite
text: Good basic pizza with many options.

name: Holz Twopointo
text: Great food.. great company!

name: timothy cooley
text: Pretty good pizza for a chain...

name: Linsey C
text: The cauliflower crust is the best!

name: Doug Byrd
text: Great serving sizes, huge desserts, friendly, and food bundles. Draft and Bottled beer.

name: Mary Fields
text: Love it! Simple ingredients, healthy portion sizes and friendly staff.

name: j k
text: Vegan cheese available. Not the place to go for a salad

name: shane curtis
text: Great pizza they was short handed so tables was dirty but overall great

name: skcusloa
text: Pizza and beer are awesome. Employees friendly.

name: Eric st. clair
text: Great experience!!!! Delish!!!! Dakota and Trey really are all stars!!! Fast and very helpful!!!

text: Cheap fast great!

text: All I can say is.......amazing pizza!!!!!

text: Go to blaze or order papa John's this place sucks

text: Better than pizza and seating than Blaze
